full_address: 288 North Deep Creek Road, North Deep Creek, Qld 4570
description:
Matthew McAuliffe from Ray White presents to the market 288 North Deep Creek Road, North Deep Creek, this immaculate property is set upon 30 acres of organic fertile land, with a large two story four bedroom home, good shedding and permanent water this could just be the ultimate tree change that you have been looking for.

The residence has been renovated and offers 4 bedrooms, 2 large living areas and 3 bathrooms over two levels, With large open plan living upstairs opening out onto the rear balcony so you can enjoy views over the property and the inground pool. The main bedroom has a large ensuite and a separate private entrance from the front balcony which has views out over the dam.

There is a large inground pool (approx 8.5m x 4m) that is the perfect place to relax on those hot summer days.
It has a large fully fenced yard, a 5kw solar system which is battery ready and an assortment of mature fruit trees including mango, guava, pineapple guava, persimmon, mandarin, mulberry, dragon fruit, sandpaper fig, grapefruit, passionfruit, macadamia, Bunya nut.

The property consists of 5 paddocks with cattle yards complete with loading ramp. There are two large sheds, a chook pen with its own water and the original blacksmiths cottage from the original homestead.

There is approximately 750 metres of creek frontage and a large spring fed dam which has never run dry in the current owners time on the property.
The owners have been organic (non certified) for the past 17 years, there has been no pesticides or herbicides used on the property in their time. The soil is extremely fertile and the pastures will accommodate approximately 25 to 30 head of stock and it could be suitable for sub-division subject to council approval.

The position is perfect offering loads of privacy but only a short 10 minute drive into the Gympie CBD, it is so close to all the amenities the town has to offer.


Some of the features you will love:

• 30 Acres of fertile usable land
• Master Bedroom with ensuite and private balcony access
• Open plan living upstairs
• Modern Kitchen with good storage
• Huge second downstairs living area
• Separate laundry
• 5kw solar system (battery ready)
• Air Conditioning for those summer days
• Fully fenced yard to main house
• 5 paddocks with Cattle yards
• 2 large sheds & chook pen
• Large inground pool (approx 8.5m x 4m)
• Plenty of water storage
• Rich soil, high rainfall
• School bus to front gate
• 10 min to CBD and Schools


This property simply has exactly what you need...absolute privacy, a lovely home, good pastures, water... excellent soils and is located in some of the most magnificent country that South East Queensland has to offer. It is extremely well located being close to the renowned coastal regions of Cooloola, Fraser Island and the Sunshine Coast beaches, with Noosa (55min), Rainbow Beach 50min) and Tin Can Bay (40min) all less than an hours drive, while the Gympie CBD is only 10 minutes.

Please call Matthew McAuliffe on 0412111608 to arrange your inspection as this property will not last.
